attributes.action: We are calling for the government to breakaway on Autism been a closed shop, we SAAS Staffordshire adults Autistic Society are calling for the government to provide, a funding process on a level plain field enabling autism groups in the UK to access government funding for projects  in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel this is not happening in the UK, especially in Staffordshire.

 

Kevin Healey “we have struggled to find funding”  this has been only channelled to one or two organizations in the UK, I have campaigned for the last eight years and services have not moved forward.

 

The government need to put better autism services in place recently one of our speakers who was planned to attend our autism conference on the 7th may 2008 sadly committed suicide she was autistic and a well known author and speaker, this is now happening more often in the UK where young people take there own life’s because they can’t cope with the anxiety and stress with the condition and the impact it has with the family affected with autism.
